sqoop.arg: SELECT PalletID,PalletNo,PartID,InvStateID,Quantity,CurrentQuantity,Locked,Complete,CreatedDT,CompletedDT,MachineStageID,PrincipleWOID,PalletIndex,ModulePartID,Merged,PadLock,IsBtoCto, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_Pallet WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcqCtxVarClassID,AcquisitionContextID,VariableTypeClassID,IsOS,IsOC, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcqCtxVarClass WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageID,AcquisitionVariantID,LastMeasurementSetID,AcquisitionContextID,LastDoneDT,IsAttrOC,IsCriticalDefect, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionContext WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,AcquisitionID,MeasurementSetTagProfileID,PartInstanceTagProfileID,DefectTagProfileID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RfDataCollectionFreqID,DataCollectionPeriod,IsRetired,AcqPlan,VMTPID,CauseActionTPID,Variant,PartTypeID,RevisionNo,IsEdited,HeadAlias,CauseTagListID,ActionTagListID,IsMeasuredWhenProduced,IsInvPackCheck,IsEBATrigger, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ActionPlanID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,ActionTypeID,ActionSubTypeID,ActionPlanCode,ActionName,Description,ActionPlanOrder,RfPriorityID,IsRetired,VariableTypeID,AttributeTypeID,IsCompulsory,SortOrder,IsOCApplicable,IsOSApplicable, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionPlan WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AddressID,Address1,Address2,City,County,PostCode,Country, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Address WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetID,ParentAssetID,SubAssetID,Lvl,SortOrder,Comments,AssetLevelID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AttributeTypeGroupID,Name,Description,AttributeTypeGroupCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AttributeTypeGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT BOMItemID,BOMVariantID,PartID,SubPartID,SubPartQuantity,SubPartUnitID,RfInvPackTraceabilityID,Sequence,Instructions,RfBOMItemTypeID,IsDefault,IsAllowExceedBOMQty,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMItem WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CommentsID,LoginID,DT,Subject,Comments, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Comments WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernTypeID,ConcernType,Description,ConcernTypeCode,Format, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ConcernType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CustomerID,Customer,CustomerCode,AddressID,RfLanguageID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Customer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DocumentID,FileName,Description,MimeType,Attachment,UploadDT,LoginID,DocumentTypeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Document WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT FaultID,Fault,FaultComments,AssetID,MaintenanceWorkID,ReportedByLoginID,FaultReportedDT,CommonFaultID,FaultStateID,TimeToRespond,TimeToRepair,TimeResponseToRepair,RevisionNo,IsEdited,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Cause,MachineStopID,Symptoms, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Fault WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT GaugeTypeID,GaugeType, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.GaugeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryUsageID,StartUsingComments,StopUsingComments,StartLoginID,StopLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedEndDT,SavedStartDT,SavedEndDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedInventoryUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineGroupID,LineGroup,LineGroupCode,Description,OEETarget,WasteTarget,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineSectionID,LineSection,Description,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineSection WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AttributeTypeGroupID,AttributeTypeID,LkATATGID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkATATG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LKConcernInventoryPackID,ConcernID,InventoryPackID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKConcernInventoryPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentAssetID,DocumentID,AssetID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentAsset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentWIStepID,WorkInstructionStepID,DocumentID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentWIStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineID,LineSectionID,LkLLSID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLLS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageID,MachineGroupID,LkMGMSID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMGMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartTypeID,OperationTypeID,IsInventoryCarriedOver,LkOpTPartTConsumedID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTPartTConsumed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkPartSupplierID,PartID,SupplierID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartSupplier WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCCalcStyleID,RfViolationRuleID,RfChartComponentID,LkSPCCSVRID,RuleRange,RuleGroup, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkSPCCSVR WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolStateID,ToolCavityID,RfToolCavityStatusID,ToolCavityStateReasonID,IsCavityChangeState,LkTSTCID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkTSTC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeGroupID,VariableTypeID,LkVTVTGID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkVTVTG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageCellID,MachineStageID,IsCreator,IsConsumer,IsLabeller,IsAutoBatchNo,IsPackConsumer,IsResortConsumer,IsNonJob,IsToolShowCavities,IsInvPackPackNo,IsInvPackPartNo,IsInvPackPartDesc,IsInvPackPartType,IsInvPackQty,IsInvPackHeader,IsInvPackRows,IsInvPackState,IsInvPackReason,IsAcqDblck,AcqGrid,CustomPage,IsClickable,IsDrillable, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageCell WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageTypeID,Name,Description,MachineStageTypeCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceManHourPlannedID,MaintenanceProcedureID,PlannedManHours,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,SupplierCost, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceManHourPlanned WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureID,MaintenanceProcedure,PartID,ResponsibleDepartmentID,BudgetWorkDone,PlannedManHours,PlannedDuration,MaintenanceProcedureCode,AdvanceWarningPeriod,SchedulingWindow,PlannedMachineStageDowntime,PlannedLineDowntime,SubPartID,CreatedDT,CreatedLoginID,RfMaintenanceWorkTypeID,CostCentreID,IsAutoAuthoriseWork,IsRetired,IsToolTakenOutOfService, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedure WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureStepID,MaintenanceProcedureStep,MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,StepOrder,SubPartID,Component,RfMaintenanceCheckTypeID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,Test,USL,LSL,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,Nom,Units,DecPlaces, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceWorkStatusID,MaintenanceWorkStatus,Description,RfMaintenanceWorkStatusID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWorkStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetPID,ActualAttrSampleSize,AcquisitionContextID,IsEdited,DT,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RevisionNo,PartID,JobID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSetP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCClientID,OPCClient,ComputerID,ModifiedDT,LastUpdateDT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCClient WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCGroupID,Deadband,UpdateRate,OPCGroup,IsActive,RfGroupNotifyModeID,TimeBias,OPCServerID,IsPublic,LocalID,CacheUpdateRate, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCMachineEventCodeID,OPCMachineEventCode,OPCMachineEventID,MachineStopReasonID,IsRunning, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCMachineEventCode WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCTextID,OPCItemID,Description,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCText WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartInstanceID,MeasurementSetID,HeadNo,SampleNo,SerialNo, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartInstance WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductID,ProductTypeID,Name,Description,IsRetired,PartID,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Product WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductTypeID,Name,ProductTypeCode,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ScrapID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedScrapID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Scrap_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantDefaultsID,StartOfDay,StartOfWeek,StartOfYear,RfLocaleID,RfDefaultCurrencyID,DataEntryDefaultURI,OnDataCommitGoTo,ChainToStopped,ColourStagesForCurrentJob,UnAckAlarmsPeriod,ShowOverdueIcon,ShowAlarmIcon,WONumberModeID,IsShowVarClassCombo,IsShowAcqClassCombo,RfMachineStopRecordModeID,IsAutoCreateProductsForParts,IsAutoCreateProductTypeForPart,EnforceClosedAlarms,ColourOrder,IsAutoReleaseJob,JobClose,IsAllowDuplicateWONumbers,WoClose,IsOverdueRefToJob,DefaultSPCCalcStyleID,IsAllowInventoryInserts, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantDefaults WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ShiftlyChecksDoneID,shiftid,jobid,fromdt,todt,partid,acquisitioncontextid,machinestageid,acquisitionvariantid,acquisitionid,downtime,uptime,total_time,datacollectionperiod,checks_req,checks_req_after_downtime,checks_done,updated_dt, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftlyChecksDone WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCCalcStyleID,SPCCalcStyle,CmThreshold,CpThreshold,PpThreshold,CgThreshold,RnRThreshold,IsShowCpOnlyIfStable,CAMTarget,CpBasedOnID,CLBasedOnID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCCalcStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetID,SPCChartSet,AcquisitionID,SPCURI,RfDataBandID,NPeriods,SpecTypeID,IsRunningProductOnly,LHSessionID,MaxTrendRecallWindow, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSet WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultViewID,Sequence,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,AcquisitionUsageID,OverlayFlags, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT EDIT,Site,Control_No,CSF_No,AssetExternalControl_No,Manufacturer,EquipmentName,Model_No,Serial_No,EquipmentLocation,CalRequired,CalFrequency,CalDate,CalDueDate,Owner,CalibrationSite,Calibrator,Status,Isthelastcalibrationoutoftolerance,DueDate, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPMM_CalTools WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagCauseActionID,CauseActionID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagCauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagListValueID,TagListID,TagListValue,DisplayOrder,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagListValue WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTreeID,TagTree, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTree WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT TagProfileID,TagTypeID,EntryOrder,CompulsoryConditions,IsDefaulted,IsEncrypted,TagListID,IsReadOnly,RptQueryID,TagTypeInTagProfileID,TagTreeID,RfTagDataSourceID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTypeInTagProfile WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolID,Tool,ToolSet,Description,ToolTypeID,IsRetired,NoCavities,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,PartID,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolCavityID,CavityNumber,CavityName,ToolID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolCavity WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolStateID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,RfToolStatusID,LoginID,Comments,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT UnitID,Unit,Description, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Unit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT UnitCountTypeID,UnitCountType,Description,MachineStageTypeID,DefaultUnitID,IsQuantityIn,IsQuantityOut,IsMaintenanceCount,IsConvertableToBaseUnits,AssetCountTypeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCountType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT VariableTypeID,Name,ProductTypeID,Description,IsUnilateral,VariableTypeCode,IsProcessParameter,VariableTypeClassID,ImageURI, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT VarMeasurementPID,SpecID,MeasurementSetPID,Measurement,Ignored,VariableTypeID,ProductID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,DT,RfIsOSID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarMeasurementP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WOID,BaseWONumber,Txn_date,Wip_Entity_ID,Alternate_Bom,WO_Status,IsBtoCto, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WorkInstructionStepID,WorkInstructionStep,WorkInstructionProcedureID,OperationTypeID,StepOrder,RfSpecialActionTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Job.JobID, Job.WOID, Job.RfJobStatusID, Job.DeadlineDT, Job.ActualStartDT, Job.ActualEndDT, Job.PlannedStartDT, Job.PlannedEndDT, Job.PlannedDuration, Job.EstimatedStartDT, Job.EstimatedEndDT, Job.EstimatedDuration, Job.ScheduledSequence, Job.LineID, Job.ProductionStartDT, Job.ProductionEndDT, Job.TheoreticalCycleTime, Job.BudgetChangeOver, Job.QuantityOrdered, Job.IsCalculated, Job.LineGroupID, Job_.JobInstructions, Job_.ReleaseDT, Job_.ReleaseLoginID, Job_.StartLoginID, Job_.EndLoginID, Job_.Comments, Job_.ModifiedDt, Job_.ModifiedLoginID, Job_.StoppedReason, Job_.SkippedReason, Job_.SkippedDT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM Job FULL JOIN Job_ ON (Job.JobID = Job_.JobID) FULL JOIN Job_Custom ON (Job.JobID = Job_Custom.JobID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStop.MachineStopID, MachineStop.MachineStopReasonID, MachineStop.FromDT, MachineStop.ToDT, MachineStop.MachineStageID, MachineStop.IsEdited, MachineStop.RevisionNo, MachineStop_.StopComments, MachineStop_.StartComments, MachineStop_.StartLoginID, MachineStop_.StopLoginID, MachineStop_.OpenedStopDT, MachineStop_.SavedStopDT, MachineStop_.OpenedStartDT, MachineStop_.SavedStartDT, MachineStop_.OriginalLoginID, MachineStop_.EditedMachineStopID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM MachineStop FULL JOIN MachineStop_ ON (MachineStop.MachineStopID = MachineStop_.MachineStopID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
